verses.text: \w Wisdom|strong="H2454"\w* hath \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, she hath hewn \w out|strong="H2672"\w* her \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w*:

She hath \w killed|strong="H2873"\w* her \w beasts|strong="H2874"\w*; she hath \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w* her \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*; she hath also \w furnished|strong="H6186"\w* her \w table|strong="H7979"\w*.\f + \fr 9.2 \ft her beasts: Heb. her killing\f*

She hath sent \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* her \w maidens|strong="H5291"\w*: she \w crieth|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H1610"\w* the highest \w places|strong="H4791"\w* of the \w city|strong="H7176"\w*,

Whoso \add is\add* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him turn \w in|strong="H5493"\w* hither: \add as for\add* him that \w wanteth|strong="H2638"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*, she \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to him,

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w eat|strong="H3898"\w* of my \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \add which\add* I have \w mingled|strong="H4537"\w*.
\w Forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \w foolish|strong="H6612"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; and \w go|strong="H0833"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.

He that \w reproveth|strong="H3256"\w* a \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w* \w getteth|strong="H3947"\w* to himself \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*: and he that \w rebuketh|strong="H3198"\w* a \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add man getteth\add* himself a \w blot|strong="H3971"\w*.

\w Reprove|strong="H3198"\w* not a \w scorner|strong="H3887"\w*, lest he \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee: \w rebuke|strong="H3198"\w* a wise \w man|strong="H2450"\w*, and he will \w love|strong="H0157"\w* thee.

\w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \add instruction\add* to a \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add man\add*, and he will be yet \w wiser|strong="H2449"\w*: \w teach|strong="H3045"\w* a \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \add man\add*, and he will \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* in \w learning|strong="H3948"\w*.

The \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*: and the \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \add is\add* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w*.
For by me thy \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w* shall be \w increased|strong="H3254"\w*.

If thou be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w*, thou shalt be \w wise|strong="H2449"\w* for thyself: but \add if\add* thou \w scornest|strong="H3887"\w*, thou alone shalt \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ A \w foolish|strong="H3687"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \add is\add* \w clamorous|strong="H1993"\w*: \add she is\add* \w simple|strong="H6615"\w*, \w and|strong="H1077"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H4100"\w*.

For she \w sitteth|strong="H3427"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, on a \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H4791"\w* of the \w city|strong="H7176"\w*,
To \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w passengers|strong="H5674"\w* who go \w right|strong="H3474"\w* on their \w ways|strong="H0734"\w*:

Whoso \add is\add* \w simple|strong="H6612"\w*, let him turn \w in|strong="H5493"\w* hither: and \add as for\add* him that \w wanteth|strong="H2638"\w* \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*, she \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* to him,

\w Stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* are \w sweet|strong="H4985"\w*, and \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \add eaten\add* in \w secret|strong="H5643"\w* is \w pleasant|strong="H5276"\w*.\f + \fr 9.17 \ft eaten…: Heb. of secrecies\f*

But he \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not that the \w dead|strong="H7496"\w* \add are\add* there; \add and that\add* her \w guests|strong="H7121"\w* \add are\add* in the \w depths|strong="H6012"\w* of \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*.
